content: espace tricot is a yarn store in montreal canada discover our yarns here www espacetricot com 1 the bolton pass shawl with its twisted rib and triangle motif is a nod to the majestic pass that cuts through the valley of the sutton mountains in the eastern townships region of quebec worn as a shawl or scarf the stockinette and rib textures create a gender-neutral look and the luscious bfl-masham blend will keep you cozy and stylish all year long **note pattern was updated on august 27 2021 with a clarification on how to work the repeat in body section 1 ** yarn espace tricot sunday morning dk 75% bluefaced leicester 25% masham 268 yds 245 m / 100g 5 skeins - shown in offline or approximately 1045m/1143y of a dk weight yarn note that you will have enough yarn leftover to make the bolton pass hat
